octavia_load_balancer_pools_protocol_hel: The protocol on which this pool and its members are listening.
octavia_load_balancer_pools_algorithm_he: The Load Balancer algorithm that distributes traffic between pool members.
octavia_load_balancer_pools_description_: A pool is a group of back-end members that share a common configuration, such as the Load Balancer algorithm, probe, or persistent session configuration.
octavia_load_balancer_pools_create_succe: Your {{ pool }} pool has been created.
octavia_load_balancer_pools_edit_success: Your {{ pool }} pool has been modified.
